name: Doom 3: BFG Edition
description: Doom 3:BFG Edition from GOG using RBDOOM-3-BFG engine

files.install: N/A:Select the Doom 3 installer from GOG

task.name: wine.wineexec
task.description: Be patient, this task may take several minutes.

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the Doom 3 installer from GOG
- rbdoom: https://lutris.net/files/games/doom-3/rbdoom-3-bfg-1.1.0-x86_64.tar.gz
game:
  exe: game/RBDoom3BFG
  ld_library_path: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/lib64/
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating temporary WINE prefix.
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: wine.create_prefix
    prefix: $CACHE/pfx
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /DIR="C:/game"
    description: Be patient, this task may take several minutes.
    executable: install
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $CACHE/pfx
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/pfx/drive_c/game
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game
    file: rbdoom
    type: tgz
- write_file:
    content: set sys_lang "english"
    file: $GAMEDIR/game/base/default.cfg
    mode: a
